name: Data-Analyst-ND
tagline: A collection of my projects completed for Udacity's Data Analyst Nanodegree
body:
## Data-Analyst-ND
*A collection of my projects completed for Udacity's Data Analyst Nanodegree*

#### Project 1: Testing a Perceptual Phenomenon (The Stroop Effect).

* Udacity Course: Statistics.
* Analysis for project completed in Excel.
* View [project 1](https://github.com/stollercm/Data-Analyst-ND/tree/master/project-1) on GitHub.

#### Project 2: Analyzing the New York City Subway Dataset.

* Udacity Course: Intro to Data Science.
* Analysis for project completed using Python
* Python modules: NumPy, SciPy, pandas, pandasql, statsmodels, matplotlib, ggplot.
* View [project 2](https://github.com/stollercm/Data-Analyst-ND/tree/master/project-2) on GitHub.

#### Project 3: Data Wrangle OpenStreetMap Data.

* Udacity Course: Data Wrangling with MongoDB.
* Analysis for project completed using Python, MongoDB, and Excel.
* Python modules: ElementTree, PyMongo.
* View [project 3](https://github.com/stollercm/Data-Analyst-ND/tree/master/project-3) on GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
